subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Joba Chamberlain, the organization’s top prospect, left Class AAA Scranton/Wilkes-Barre on Monday to fly to Toronto, where he will presumably be activated Tuesday.
snippet: Joba Chamberlain, the organization’s top prospect, left Class AAA Scranton/Wilkes-Barre on Monday to fly to Toronto, where he will presumably be activated Tuesday.
